BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 040259Z AUG
   BY M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT
   3.5 MILE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-29S 040-53W, 23-51S 041-08W,
   24-04S 040-43W, 24-24S 040-42W,
   23-58S 040-32W, 23-43S 041-15W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 040359Z AUG 12.
